cardDescriptionTwo: Do you want to change your look for a special occasion? I will do it for you! See my offer.
name: Name
offerTitleTwo: Remember about a few steps before make up:
offerTextTwo_1: Before make up make eyebrow shaping. With nice eyebrows make up looks muvh beter and more estetic.
offerTextTwo_2: One day before make up service make gentle peeling of your face to get rid of dead skin, thanks that make up will be more durable. Remember to do it gentle. We dont want skin to be irritated. After this step put your favourite moisturizing cream.
offerTextTwo_3: On make up service day come with nothing on your face no cream, no primer, no maskara and anything on eyebrows. Face needs to be naked. Extra make up removal makes service will take longer .
offerTextTwo_4: Do not go sleep with make up. Remeber to remove make up after circumstance.
offerTextTwo_5: Dont rub when remove make up. Cosmetic which I use for make up are permanently you can use your I suggest to use some oil for example coconut oil just make sure you are not alergic on kind of oli which you use to remove make up also you an use special cleansing balm to melt and remove make up. Later use your favourite face wash gel. Thanks that remove makeup without ant problems.
offerTextTwo_6: Remember its only make up will be permanently but any mechanical damage like rubbing,  touching face cut short durability.
offerTextTwo_7: Be on time. Delay more than 20 min make the service will not be performed.
offerTextTwo_8: Unfortunately I am not commuting to my customers.
